text: If the duke made any reply to this, Vittoria did not hear it. Now they entered the long gallery where they dispersed and wandered around, admiring and commenting on the glowing hues and barbaric splendours of the tapestries Doria had brought back We must talk further'he said in a low urgent voice.'Where? not hear it.Now they entereol the long gallery ancl commenting on the glowing hues and barbaric. buck from Lepanto.Atter a Short intervae,Orsin founol an opportunity to rejoin Vittoria We must talk turther,'he saidl in a low urgent yoice.'where?
